attributes.review: So this app is bad because it is very laggy and glitching and I kept seeing weird stuff on there and every time I delete this app’s page I get logged out of my account and for some reason they kept putting in my REAL personal information in as if they were trying to track me down so pls get rid of this app and delete it OFF of the Apple store
attributes.title: Erm none of yo business..

attributes.review: There is NO manager who can call to fix the unacceptable service of this app. I’m gonna sue EVERYONE who works with this app and I no longer support trump because THIS APP ASSAULTED ME PHYSICALLY AND VERBALLY. Now I have an injured brain cell, the only brain cell I have and it’s injured because of these dirty SCUM BAGS who don’t know how to respect the wife of a very rich man. When my husband hears about this he and I will be LIVID. ✨😡🤬🤧🤡💩
attributes.title: just a conservative Karen trying to spread the word of our beloved orang✨🎃

attributes.review: I downloaded this app off of a recommendation from a friend. I’m a huge annoying orange fan and I over heard a friend talking about this app and how the annoying orange uses it to tell his fans information. I was very disappointed when I downloaded the app to realize that I was mistaken and they were taking about a different annoying orange. Don’t make the same mistake I did!
attributes.title: Annoying orange

attributes.review: The second i downloaded this app the walls of my room were covered in Trump 2020 flags🥴and my closet was filled with camo and neon.💀 i also experienced some EXTREME ✨homophobia and racism✨ (not to mention that i became pro life) my neck then started to hurt from being so red🥊 and on top of ALL THAT i got a really bad farmers tan! overall, i would NOT 😡RECOMMEND getting this app because you WILL start molesting children. that is all, good day. 🙈👁👅👁😁👍🏻✨👄🏳️‍🌈🥦😩😊😳😔🤩😂💀😊👀🥴
attributes.title: yucky🤢

attributes.review: Wow! Not sure what to say except how much I HATE this app! Absolutely terrible. Once it downloaded, I was so excited to learn more about my favorite president. Unfortunately, I only learned how terrible he is! News flash, is actually kind of racist😬This should not be on the App Store. The only app I care about getting my information from is TikTok, so I would refer anyone reading this to download that app instead.
attributes.title: Deez Nutz

attributes.review: TRUMP 2020! I recently downloaded this app to be updated in any events catch anything I’ve missed but when I opened the app it immediately kicked me off. I thought maybe my phone was bugging out so I restarted my phone. I got back on the app but it still continued to kick me off. I had my husband download it, but it was the same for him. I would not recommend this app. Thumbs down.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app yesterday and then I let my whale🐋play games on my phone somehow he got to this app and FaceTimed Donald Trump aka the chubby cheato so Trump used his “keep America great” powers to keep my whale burning me now he breathes fine and caught 7 of my houses on fire 🔥 I think if I iron my door 🚪 I can fix this but it’s still a terrible app would not recommend to anyone
attributes.title: Gave my whale the ability to breathe fire he keeps burning me

attributes.review: Um this app is really bad it just it isn’t it. Like ✨everything✨ about this app is just down right ✨horrible✨. Apple please make better choices when deciding which apps will be in your App Store ✨thanks✨
attributes.title: ✨absolutely horrible ✨

attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: first of all, this app took a month to download onto my phone! second, when i opened the app i was met with horrible images and messages from our 🍊president 🍊i am so upset and horrified by this app. not to mention it made my eyes fall out (this is voice to text) it also made my brand new iphone 11 crash. RATE THIS APP 1 STAR SO OTHER PEOPLES PHONES WONT CRASH💥 if it weren’t for this app i’d still be able to see😡
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP, KEPT CRASHING
